item.description: I FORGOT TO MENTION THIS, but I posted a song that I co-wrote and performed on yt a while back, and today my dad said it popped up on his reccomended as a part of a playlist of country music??? like, I have nothing against country music, but I had no idea that I'd written any ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ’€

RECORDING IN PROGRESS ðŸ¤©ðŸ¤© aaaand also I'm considering adding onto this website ðŸ‘€ it's a fun little site but I want to make it MORE fun, yknow? idk how I'm gonna do it, but I'll certainly give it a try!

I wanna learn to do more electronic-y music production ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ it seems so fun + the timing might be easier since you can quantize stuff (or whatever it is) as opposed to trying to line it all up with my 53rd messy take of guitar
I have a song I SHOULD be working on and I have some songs I WANT to be working on but I will be working on NONE OF THEM
my executive dysfunction doesnâ€™t like me today ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ or maybe it likes me too much
songwriting inspo feels really weird sometimes ðŸ¥² planning out a three song EP, writing a few songs over a week, and now having to sort out a NINE SONG ALBUM??? wild

HEYYYYYYY DIY MICROBLOG??? This whole thing is HEAVILY based on Threads, but I wanted to make something to see if I could! turns out, it's not as hard as I thought it'd be ðŸ‘€ this doesn't even REALLY have to be a microblog, since there's no character limit! I think this is will be a fun little place for updates and announcements!
uhhhh oops, I redid the whole site bc it was so bad on mobile that it hurt my brain ðŸ¥² aaaanyway, I think this layout's much better than the previous one, so we'll see how it goes!
NEW LAYOUTTTTTT ðŸ¤©ðŸ¤© I coded all of it myself and I'm very proud of it ðŸ¥¹ðŸ’– it might be a little messy right now, but I'm working on it!
